descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kemba Walker dribbles around Blake Griffin and makes him fall while driving to the basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kemba puts Griffin on skates with this bucket) 2021/5/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kemba puts Griffin on skates with this bucket

videos.description: James Harden is fouled while shooting the 3-pointer, drains the shot and then hits the free throw for the four-point play.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Harden completes the 4-point play in Nets' rout) 2021/5/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden completes the 4-point play in Nets' rout

videos.description: Blake Griffin throws down two vicious dunks off quick passes in the third quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Blake Griffin turns back the clock with these slams) 2021/5/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Blake Griffin turns back the clock with these slams

videos.description: After getting poked in his right eye, Jayson Tatum leaves the court and is ruled out for the game.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tatum leaves game after getting poked in eye) 2021/5/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tatum leaves game after getting poked in eye
